interface.name: org.alljoyn.Onboarding
interface.description: This interface defines the Onboarding functionality.

property.name: LastError
property.description: The last error code and error message. Error_message is the error message received from the underlying Wi-Fi layer.

method.name: ConfigureWiFi
method.description: Sends the personal AP information to the onboardee.

method.name: Connect
method.description: Tells the onboardee to connect to the personal AP. It is recommended that the onboardee use the concurrency feature, if it is available.

method.name: Offboard
method.description: Tells the onboardee to disconnect from the personal AP, clear the personal AP configuration fields, and start the soft AP mode.

method.name: GetScanInfo
method.description: Scans all the Wi-Fi access points in the onboardee's proximity.

signal.name: ConnectionResult
signal.description: This signal is emitted when the connection attempt against the personal AP is completed.
